com.erudika.para.queue

Class AWSQueueUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erudika.para.queue.AWSQueueUtils

  • public final class AWSQueueUtils
extends Object
    Helper utilities for connecting to AWS SQS.
    Author:
    Alex Bogdanovski [alex@erudika.com]

    • Method Summary

      Starts polling for messages from SQS in a separate thread.

      • pullMessages

        public static List<String> pullMessages(String queueURL,
                                        int numberOfMessages)
        Pulls a number of messages from an SQS queue.
        Parameters:
        queueURL - the URL of the SQS queue
        numberOfMessages - the number of messages to pull
        Returns:
        a list of messages

      • startPollingForMessages

        Starts polling for messages from SQS in a separate thread.
        Parameters:

      • stopPollingForMessages

        public static void stopPollingForMessages(String queueURL)
        Stops the thread that has been polling for messages.
        Parameters:
        queueURL - the queue URL
